name: 我愛師大附中HSNU
description:
This is an online game about the scene of the High School Affiliated to Normal University. The game is currently in beta version and only has the function of visiting the campus (you can currently see several monsters on campus)
The developer is a mathematics teacher at the HSNU. He became interested in making games because he was a student in the Department of Digital Media. He taught himself blender and unity for more than a year and spent another year building the campus scene of the high school attached.
The official version will be released before the end of the year, but because I am preparing for the Yunke Digital Media Research Institute, I am not sure when it will be completed. In addition, my own C# programming ability is relatively weak, so it will take several weeks to solve the problems encountered.
It is currently free. If we need to expand the number of people online at the same time, we will consider charging some funds to support the server.

Modeling:
The first one to model was the middle part of the country, so it was the most detailed but the technique was the roughest.
Each of the following buildings takes about half a month to complete. There may be subtle differences. We will slowly correct them when we have time.

Post-game update goals:
The game aims to be played for 60-90 minutes. If you reach the specified target level every 5 minutes, you will receive generous rewards.
The current attack modes may only include slashing and spells (but the attack explosion range and spell explosion range can be increased), and many other optional auxiliary skills will be added in the new year.
From time to time, there will be monsters in the playground that exceed the player's level, and you need to cooperate to defeat them to get rewards.
Player attacks against players are ineffective, but as you go to the basement, the further away from the ground, the lower the player's damage reduction will be. Currently, there is an independently developed parking area with ten floors underground.
In the test version, if the blood volume is 0, there will be no death and rebirth, and attacking players will be invalid.

sponsor:
If you want to sponsor a little bit of the tuition for graduate school for the next two years and the cost of the high-speed train to Yunlin every week, there is a small QR code at the end of the left hand corner of the map that can help me. Thank you.
